data.title: Will 'Let It Be' film ever be officially re-released?
data.meta_description: HaileyMcComet: That's a common misconception. But just before everyone dies and their soul starts to open up and become more enlightened, they all learn to speak in proper American English.
data.text:
oobu24:

I was looking up a few Let It Be things on youtube & came across some funny (?) & some nice clips. "They broke up 'cause Yoko sat on an amp"

"RIGHT INTO RINGO'S FACE": Paul McCartney BORES Ringo Starr To TEARS In 1969 "Let It Be" Footage!! Let It Be session - For You Blue by The Beatles LENNON TWO OF US - LET IT BE SESSION

Nancy R:

oobu24:

I was looking up a few Let It Be things on youtube & came across some funny (?) & some nice clips. "They broke up 'cause Yoko sat on an amp"

"RIGHT INTO RINGO'S FACE": Paul McCartney BORES Ringo Starr To TEARS In 1969 "Let It Be" Footage!! Let It Be session - For You Blue by The Beatles LENNON TWO OF US - LET IT BE SESSION

And George caught Yoko eating some of his biscuits (cookies) They each had their private stash of munchies. He was looking down through the control booth window and saw her and yelled "That b*tch!" I think John heard him and was none too pleased!

JoeySmith:

I still dont get it. The film shows the band's creative process in the studio. Of course, there will be creative differences & disagreements. Its not like they were insulting each other in public. Imagine the rooftop concert expanded & remastered! Plus, there must be so many other good out-takes they can include. Paul has given the o.k. Is Yoko the one holding this up?

yankeefan7:

JoeySmith:

I still dont get it. The film shows the band's creative process in the studio. Of course, there will be creative differences & disagreements. Its not like they were insulting each other in public. Imagine the rooftop concert expanded & remastered! Plus, there must be so many other good out-takes they can include. Paul has given the o.k. Is Yoko the one holding this up?

I agree. I truly doubt if you did this same type of movie with any band there would not be disagreements and moments of nastiness. I did not know the rooftop concert was longer so any additional l footage would be cool. In a way, I am kind of surprised they did not try to release movie again when they released "Let It Be Naked".
